# Node.js dependencies
# Huge folder that can be regenerated by running `npm install`
/node_modules

# Python virtual environment
# Huge folder, specific to your machine, regenerated with `pip install`
/venv

# Python cache files
/__pycache__/
*.pyc

# Build output from Vite and electron-builder
# These are the final generated application files
/dist
/dist_electron

# Build output from PyInstaller
# These are the generated backend executable files
/build
/backend.exe
*.spec

# Log files
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*
*.log

# Environment variables
# Should never be public, contains secrets
.env
.env.*
!.env.example

# IDE and editor directories
.vscode
.idea
*.suo
*.ntvs*
*.njsproj
*.sln
*.sw?

# OS-generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
